name: todo-list
description: | Api Route | | --------- | | Method    | Enpoint | Payload | Response | Action | | GET       | /todos | \- | \[todos\] | Get All Todos form DB | | POST      | /todos | {"title":String,"completed":Bollean} | {todo} | Create new Todo | | PUT       | /todos/:id | {"title":String,"completed":Bollean} | {todo} | Update Existing Todo by ID | | DELETE    | /todos/:id | \- | \- | Deletes todo |
